title: What are all the ways people searched for travel before the internet? - Quora

response.answer_text: 1. Travel agent (professional access - get this through work). 1. Family vacation history (personal access to family memory banks - tend to go to same location, stay at same place, eat at same restaurant every summer on the first weekend the kids get off school).  Web travel has opened up freedom of choice for where I want to stay, with "when" and "at what price" type decisions.  Sites like Airbnb.com open up even more choice and control.  This means tomorrow if I decide I want to jet to NYC and find someone's couch to crash on (bonus points if that person is a YCombinator alum) I can do it.  This is amazing. This is travel as adventure again. Finally.
